Package org.cesecore.keys.validation

Interface PhasedValidator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CertificateValidator, DnsNameValidator, KeyValidator, Validator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificateValidatorBase, EccKeyValidator, ExternalCommandCertificateValidator, KeyValidatorBase, PublicKeyBlacklistKeyValidator, RsaKeyValidator, ValidatorBase
    public interface PhasedValidator
    Type for phased validator (a validator bound to a defined phased of the certificate issuance process, #see ).
    Version:
    $Id: PhasedValidator.java 27527 2017-12-12 15:49:13Z mikekushner $
